languages.text: "Значит, я — живое оружие чужой воли, закаленное на наковальне Завета молотом долга".

traits.locale_text: "Значит, я — живое оружие чужой воли, закаленное на наковальне Анн'шини молотом долга".

languages.text: "Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."
languages.original_text: "Значит, я — живое оружие чужой воли, закаленное на наковальне Завета молотом долга".

traits.locale_text: "Then that makes me a living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of Ahn'shini with the hammer of duty."
"Then that makes me a living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of Ahn'shini with the hammer of duty."
"Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of Ahn'shini with the hammer of duty."
"Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of Ahn'shini with the hammer of duty."
"Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."
"Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."

languages.text: «Entonces eso me convierte en el arma viviente de una voluntad ajena, forjada sobre el yunque de la Doctrina y bajo el martillo del deber».
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces eso me convierte en el arma viviente de una voluntad ajena, forjada sobre el yunque de la Doctrina y bajo el martillo del deber».

languages.text: 「それなら、私は誰かの意思による生きた武器ということになる。義務のハンマーを用いて、教義の金床で鍛えられた」
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、私は誰かの意思による生きた武器ということになる。義務のハンマーを用いて、教義の金床で鍛えられた」

languages.text: “也就是说，我是有血有肉的武器，以责任的重锤在教义的铁砧上锻造而成，行使祂的意志。”
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，我是有血有肉的武器，以责任的重锤在教义的铁砧上锻造而成，行使祂的意志。”

languages.text: "Dann bin ich die lebende Waffe des Willens eines anderen, geschmiedet auf dem Amboss der Grundsätze mit dem Hammer der Pflicht."
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."

traits.locale_text: "Dann bin ich die lebende Waffe des Willens eines anderen, geschmiedet auf dem Amboss der Grundsätze mit dem Hammer der Pflicht."

languages.text: « Alors, cela fait de moi l'arme vivante de la volonté d'un autre, forgée sur l'enclume des Préceptes avec le marteau du devoir. »
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, cela fait de moi l'arme vivante de la volonté d'un autre, forgée sur l'enclume des Préceptes avec le marteau du devoir. »

languages.original_text: "Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."

languages.text: "O hâlde bir başkasının iradesinin elinde silah oluyorum. İlkelerin örsünde, vazifenin çekiciyle dövülmüşüm."
languages.original_text: "Then that makes me the living weapon of another's will, forged upon the anvil of the Tenets with the hammer of duty."
